token.title: Token Pass Management
token.subtitle: Managing Token Pass of LLM Proxy Services
token.tokenPassSubtitle: Obtain an Access Token for the Proxy Gateway Service
token.apiKeyTip: It will be used for requests only and will be securely managed.
token.modelIdOptionsTip: Use any model ID from your provider. Follow the format shown - you're not limited to listed options. See provider docs for available models.
token.proxyTip: You can choose a LiteLLM proxy service based on your location and server load.
token.litellmParamsTip: Optional litellm params used for making a litellm.completion() call.
token.keySubtitle: Refresh the Access Token for the Proxy Gateway Service
token.notePlaceHolder: Create note for this pass...(20 words max)

home.title: Welcome to FlexiProxy
home.subtitle: LLM Service Proxy Gateway, Breaking Regional & Pricing Barriers
home.overviewDesc: FlexiProxy is an LLM proxy service built on the lightweight LiteLLM library, providing a unified interface to access multiple large language models. With FlexiProxy, you can:
home.benefit1: Flexibly switch backend LLM providers while using existing AI clients (such as Claude Code)
home.benefit2: Effectively solve issues like high costs or regional unavailability of certain model services
home.benefit3: Experience different LLM clients using a single API credential
home.benefit4: Enjoy unified interface standards, simplifying integration and management
home.feature1Subtitle: One API to access multiple LLM providers, easily switch between Claude, GPT, Gemini and more
home.feature2Subtitle: Overcome regional restrictions and high costs, making global AI services accessible
home.feature3Subtitle: Compatible with existing AI clients, no code changes required, instant integration
home.feature4Subtitle: Built on LiteLLM, low latency and high availability, 99.9% service stability
home.feature5Subtitle: End-to-end encryption, secure API key management, protecting your data privacy
home.feature6Subtitle: Start with free plan, upgrade on demand, support private gateway deployment
